EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_ Inaugural Geode Summit_Palo Alto_Q116.Keynotes 3-1-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Don’t Miss the Amazing Keynoters at Geode Summit March 9, Palo Alto
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Something amazing is happening in Palo Alto March 9. It’s the first gathering of over 100 users and developers of the GemFire and Geode in-memory data grid technology ever; and what were previously competitive secrets and specialized techniques will be revealed to the open source community. Speakers from 12 companies that have deployed or are running some of the largest production instances of the technology will share their experience. Register <[[https://2016.event.geodesummit.com/register]]> Geode Summit has just announced the details of the agenda of the summit. Hear from speakers building cutting edge applications with in-memory computing from companies such as Ampool, Capgemini, CIBC, Data Torrent, Murex, zData, and Pivotal.
Featured Keynote
<[[https://2016.event.geodesummit.com/schedule/sessions/keynote_creating_the_future_of_big_data_through_the_apache_way_and_why_this_matters_to_the_community.html">Creating the Future of Big Data through ]]>
Justin Erenkrantz, Head of Cloud Architecture at Bloomberg Keynote Panel
Industry Trends for In-Memory Computing <[[https://2016.event.geodesummit.com/schedule/sessions/keynote_panel_industry_trends_for_in_memory_computing.html]]>
Abhi Arunachalam, Vice President at Battery Ventures Milind Bhandarkar, Founder & CEO at Ampool Konstantin Boudnik, Co-Founder & CEO at Memcore Shawn Kung, Vice President at Micron Technology Jags Ramnarayan, Founder & CTO at SnappyData Moderator: Justin Erenkrantz This event will sell out soon! Register Now! <[[https://2016.event.geodesummit.com/register]]>
